Description of incident: An office burglary occurred sometime between October 13 and October 15.  A computer with the information of some, but not all clients was stolen.  partial list of client information was stolen.  Social Security numbers of applicants, names, addresses, phone numbers, dates of birth, income, assets and other mortgage related financial information may have been exposed.  At least 34 New York residents were affected, but the total number of affected clients nationwide was not revealed.
